metadata.title: CVE-2022-0326 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description: NULL Pointer Dereference in Homebrew mruby prior to 3.2.

criterions.comment: nghttp2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
